attributes.action: Allow more than 350 unaccompanied refugee minors to enter the UK.
attributes.additional_details: Please sign to protest the closure of the dubs amendment and show that they are welcome in Britain.
attributes.background: The Dubs amendment was a programme which set out to allow unaccompanied refugee minors to enter the UK. However a petition to close the programme was successful and only 350 unaccompanied  refugee minors will be allowed into the UK out of thousands of unaccompanied refugees in camps around europe.
